nodes.text: The Zalori system was located in the Hapan Rim Worlds, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected by the hyperlane known as the Great Rim Route to the Rynmar and Terephon systems.
The Zalori system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
